article.title: Boeing Continues Sea-Based X-Band Radar Development for Missile Defense Agency
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: The Missile Defense Agency recently announced the award of a contract modification to the Boeing Company, Huntsville, Alabama. The not-to-exceed price of the award is nearly $28 million.Â Boeing will continue the Sea-based X-band Radar development and sensors test and evaluation efforts.
